name: Superstar Streetz
description: Superstar Streetz is a multiplayer action-packed racing game. Race to success in 2 minute races, and outcompete your opponents with a range of destructive and fancy weapons across different race tracks. Thinking that’s all we have to offer? Choose and customise your favourite car to your liking, by using a range of available parts! From paints to rear wings, your car can be customised in every aspect. With Gold Key, you can benefit even more, with the ability to create and expand your garage! So what are you waiting for? Join and play Superstar Streetz, and build your fame! Download the game for free now!
